general_advisory: Cloudy weather is expected in upcoming days so farmers are advised to take precautionary measures to keep the harvested produce in a safe place. Regular monitoring against diseases in crops is recommended. Sowing of Rabi crops should be completed, and nursery preparation for Rabi Paddy is advised. Deworming and vaccination of animals is recommended.

advisory: Stop irrigation in the field before harvesting if rice is at maturity stage
Harvest when 80-85% of grains have matured and the plant looks pale yellow
Dry rice in the field for 2-3 days after harvesting, threshing should be done, store rice at 12% moisture level
Treat seeds before sowing, use specific varieties, sow with proper spacing
Varieties: Green Gram - Kamadeva, Durga, IPM 02-3, IPM 02-14, TARM1. Black Gram - Prasada, Usala, PU 31, IPU2-43, Mahuri
Thinning operation should be done for maintaining plant population
Hoeing and weeding operation is advised for 15-20 days old crop
Use improved Groundnut varieties, ensure seed treatment before sowing
Use mulching material for maintaining moisture and soil temperature
Regular monitoring against Diamond back moth in cauliflower is recommended
